headline: Teledyne Completes Acquisition of Micropac
summary: THOUSAND OAKS, Calif. & GARLAND, Texas, December 30, 2024--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) ("Teledyne") and Micropac Industries, Inc. (OTC:MPAD) ("Micropac") jointly announced today the successful completion of the previously announced merger of Micropac with a wholly-owned subsidiary of Teledyne.
